title: Gigabit capable broadband
creator: https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/ofcom
summary: Percentage of premises that have coverage from a gigabit-capable service (download speeds of 1,000 Mbps or more), UK, as of July 2024.
description:
This dataset shows the percentage of premises that have coverage from a gigabit-capable service (download speeds of 1,000 Mbps or more), in the UK, as of July 2024.

### Coverage 

UK

#### Geography definition

Local Authority Districts and Unitary Authorities,
Counties,
Combined Authorities,
Regions,
Nations (England, Wales, Scotland, Northern Ireland),
Countries (UK, GB, England and Wales)

### Source

 - United Kingdom: [Ofcom](https://www.ofcom.org.uk/phones-and-broadband/coverage-and-speeds/connected-nations-2024/) 


### Source Notes and Caveats 
Some of this data has been aggregated and may show differences to other published figures.
